snippet.title: Substitute pattern
snippet.body:
-*- python; indent: no;
import re
# Change the below to optional pattern and caller name
subst = "$p1 2 $p2 4 $p3"
caller = "\example"
# The below shouldn't need to be changed
nps = subst.count("p")
esc_call = caller.replace("\\", "\\\\")
prgx = r"([a-x]+(?![A-Za-z])(?:,|')*)"
rgx = r"\s*".join([esc_call] + [prgx] * nps)
rgxsubst = re.sub(r"\$p(\d+)\s*(\d*)", r"\\g<\1>\2", subst)
text = re.sub(rgx, rgxsubst, text)
